required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Compare PK, PD and Safety of the AD-214-02 and Rabeprazole
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Open-label, Multiple-dose, Crossover Study to Compare the Safety, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of AD-214-02 to Rabeprazole in Healthy Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: A study to compare safety, pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of AD-214-02 to Rabeprazole in healthy volunteers.

detailed_description.textblock: This study is to compare the safety, pharmacokinetic characteristics and pharmacodynamics characteristics of AD-214-02 compared with administration of Rabeprazole in healthy volunteers.

primary_outcome.measure: AUCtau,ss(Area under the plasma drug concentration-time curve)
primary_outcome.description: Evaluation PK Rabeprazole after multiple dose

primary_outcome.measure: Gastric acidity(After 7days of repeated administration, The change of integrated gastric acidity)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Day1 24hours pH monitoring, Day7 24hours pH monitoring, Day22 24hours monitoring, Day28 24hours pH monitoring
primary_outcome.description: Evaluation PD Rabeprazole after multiple dose

secondary_outcome.measure: AUCtau(Area under the plasma drug concentration-time curve)
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluation PK Rabeprazole after single dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Cmax(Maximum concentration of drug in plasma)
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluation PK Rabeprazole after single dose
Evaluation PK Rabeprazole after single dose
Evaluation PK Rabeprazole after single dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Cmax,ss(Maximum concentration of drug in plasma at steady state)
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluation PK Rabeprazole after multiple dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Tmax,ss(Time to maximum plasma concentration at steady state)
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluation PK Rabeprazole after multiple dose

secondary_outcome.measure: t1/2,ss(Terminal elimination half-life at steady state)
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluation PK Rabeprazole after multiple dose

secondary_outcome.measure: After the first dose and 7 days of repeated dosing, Percentage of time to maintain gastric pH 4.0 or higher for 24 hours
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day1 24hours pH monitoring, Day7 24hours pH monitoring, Day22 24hours monitoring, Day28 24hours pH monitoring

secondary_outcome.measure: After the first administration and 7 days of repeated administration, The median pH measured for 24 hours
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day1 24hours pH monitoring, Day7 24hours pH monitoring, Day22 24hours monitoring, Day28 24hours pH monitoring

arm_group.description: Period 1 : Test Drug(AD-214-02) Period 2 : Reference Drug(Rabeprazole)
Period 1 : Reference Drug(Rabeprazole) Period 2 : Test Drug(AD-214-02)

intervention.description: 1 tablet administered before the breakfast during 7 days
1 tablet administered before the breakfast during 7 days

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age 19~50 years in healthy volunteers
- BMI is more than 18.0 kg/m^2 , no more than 27.0 kg/m^2
- Subjects who have ability to comprehend the objectives, contents of study and property of study drug before participating in trial and have willingness to sign of informed consent in writing
Exclusion Criteria:
- Presence of medical history or a concurrent disease that may interfere with treatment and safety assessment or completion of this clinical study, including clinically significant disorders in digestive system, neuropsychiatric system, endocrine system, liver, cardiovascular system
- Subjects who judged ineligible by the investigator
